page.title: Connect With Us
page.metaDescription: Get in touch with the Love Ledger team. We welcome questions, collaboration proposals, and stories from communities interested in weaving a regenerative future.

hero.heading: Let's Weave Together
hero.description: The Love Ledger is a living, breathing ecosystem built in collaboration with communities like yours. Whether you have a question, an idea, or a story to share, we would be honored to hear from you.

contactMethods.emailDescription: For all inquiries, including community partnerships, technical questions, or press, please reach out to our core team at the email address below.

sections.title: Are you a Community or BAZ?
sections.description: Interested in piloting the Love Ledger or learning how to form a BAZ? We would love to connect and support your journey.

sections.title: Are you a Developer or Researcher?
sections.description: Want to contribute to the open-source code or collaborate on research? Connect with us via email to learn more about our technical roadmap and research needs.

sections.title: Are you a Storyteller or Artist?
sections.description: We believe in the power of stories and art to shape our future. If our vision resonates with you, we would be delighted to find ways to collaborate.
